titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation extending a former proclamation for the restraint of shipping any commoditie in strangers bottomes either into this kingdome or out of the same, vnto the speciall case of wines of the growth of France, to be imported into this kingdome, either by subiect or stranger, according to a statute in that case prouided.
Proclamations. 1615-10-12
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)

titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation extending a former proclamation for the restraint of shipping any commoditie in strangers bottomes either into this kingdome or out of the same, vnto the speciall case of wines of the growth of France, to be imported into this kingdome, either by subiect or stranger, according to a statute in that case prouided.
Proclamations. 1615-10-12
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: The "former proclamation" is that of 17 April 1615.
Dated at end: Royston the twelfth day of October, in the thirteenth yeere of our raigne ..
In this edition the first line of text ends: date.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
